import React from'react';import{attachUniversalProps}from'./helpers/universal-props';/**
 * ```jsx
 * <DropdownItem
 *  id="cookies"
 *  name="cookies"
 *  value="cookies"
 * >
 *      cookies
 * </DropdownItem>
 * ```
 */function DropdownItem(props){return React.createElement(React.Fragment,null,React.createElement("input",{className:"alegrify-dropdown__option",name:props.name,type:"radio",value:props.value,id:props.id,onChange:props.onSelect,checked:props.checked}),React.createElement("label",{className:"alegrify-dropdown__option-label",htmlFor:props.id},props.children));}export default attachUniversalProps(DropdownItem);DropdownItem.__docgenInfo={"description":"```jsx\n<DropdownItem\n id=\"cookies\"\n name=\"cookies\"\n value=\"cookies\"\n>\n     cookies\n</DropdownItem>\n```","methods":[],"displayName":"DropdownItem","props":{"value":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Value of the item"},"name":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Name of the item"},"id":{"type":{"name":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Id of the item"},"children":{"type":{"name":"union","value":[{"name":"arrayOf","value":{"name":"node"}},{"name":"node"}]},"required":true,"description":"Content for item"}}};
